body.name: Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Up to 1375 ft², 4-in-1 True HEPA Air Purifier for Pets Hair Dander Pollen Smoke Cooking Pet Smell. CADR 187 m³/h, Air Cleaner for Bedroom Nursery Living Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 37 mins
features: [POWERFUL & EFFECTIVE PURIFICATION] - Equipped with a powerful long-life motor, designed with 360-degree air intake circulation. CADR of 187 m³/h | 110 CFM. Refreshes an 825 Sq Ft space once per hour. Fresh air in minutes with Airspark air purifier for home large room and small room. Certified by ETL, FCC, and CA65. Quality assured with a 2-year free replacement warranty (filters are excluded) and lifetime technical support.

[ADVANCED 4-STAGE FILTRATION] - (Ultra Fine Pre-Filter, Enhanced Pollen & Pet Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, Active Carbon Filter). Airspark air purifiers utilize a 4-in-1 H13 True HEPA filter captures at least 99.97% of 0.3 micron particles such as smoke, pollen, pet hair, dander, and more. Absorb smoke, kitchen, cooking, and pets’ smell. Effectively improve air quality, help with sneezing, running nose, and uncomfortable symptoms caused by pets' hair, dander, pollen, or airborne particles.

[23dB WHISPER QUIET & SLEEP MODE] - Airspark newest sleek and portable air purifier for bedroom, nursery room and dorm room. Operates at a near-silent noise level as low as 23dB, along with high airflow and purification. Sleep Mode to turn off all lights. Enjoy a peaceful sleep with clean air without being disturbed.

[NIGHT LIGHT & 4 WIND SPEEDS & 2-12H TIMER] - Designed with Night Light, 1/2/3/4 adjustable wind speeds and 2/4/8/12H timer settings. Soft Night Light can be turned on for baby care as a baby air purifier or mind ease at night, or turned off to enjoy a sweat dream. 1/2/3/4 wind speeds let you easier to select a suitable wind speed according to the air quality. Run 2/4/8/12 hours before automatically powering off. Suitable air purifier for dorm room, bedroom, living room nurseries, kitchens, study room, office.

[FILTER REPLACEMENT INDICATOR] - The red HEPA filter indicator light will turn on to remind you to change the filter. Or replace with Airspark air filter every 3-6 months (up to the air quality in your area) to ensure the good air quality. Search for B0CH7VVB1J to find Airspark replacement filter for AS200 / AS300.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The charcoal filter is very effective in reducing smells and vapors. The unit is quiet and nice looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient, stylish, and quiet air purifier makes me feel refreshed
reviews.reviewText: I have been a long-term smoker, always searching for an effective way to purify indoor air to improve my living environment. For smokers, smoke and odors in the air are common issues, but this purifier, efficiently removes bad smells, significantly improving air quality. I noticed a significant reduction in bad smell in the room after using it, which makes me very satisfied.Also, the compact design of this air purifier. It not only looks stylish but also takes up minimal space, making it suitable for various occasions.Moreover, its silent design makes me almost unaware of any noise during use, and i can keep it open during my whole sleeping hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, compact and functional
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 cats and 1 dog, so the hair is crazy in my apartment. I wanted something that could help with the situation. I searched for an air purifier on Amazon. After scrolling down several pages, I decided to purchase this one because it is a new product and has a modern minimalist design. Also, I like the size and its price. Even though I was a little hesitant since I usually go for products with the most reviews, I thought about what I really wanted – a new product that is affordable and compact because my apartment is small.It is really compact, so it fits my apartment well. After using it for about two weeks, I feel a great improvement in air quality. Definitely a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say Goodbye to Pet Hair and Odors with This Stylish Air Purifier!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this air purifier to tackle the never-ending battle against dog hair and odors. I'll circle back with more detailed reviews after giving it a good run. Current impressions: loving the sleek and simple design, it's easy on the eyes. What really surprised me is how quietly it operates in modes 1, 2, and sleep mode – seriously impressive. The powerful airflow definitely adds to its charm, making sure the air stays refreshingly clean. So far, so good! Excited to see how it holds up in the long run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and quiet my house smells nice and fresh I love it
reviews.reviewText: For cleaner air to breathe in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quiet and helpful
reviews.reviewText: I put this purifier in my bedroom. I’ve been using this purifier for almost 2 weeks, the fan level 1 and 2 is very quiet, I can barely hear anything. So it’s perfect for me when I sleep. And I can also turn on and off the night light function which is very helpful too. Level 3 and 4 are very powerful, so a bit more noise is understandable. The air in my bedroom has been significantly better since using this machine! High recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well! A bit louder than expected when on high
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my bedrooms nursery nook, and it does look just as it does in the product images. I have two long hair chihuahuas who shed like crazy, so my hopes were that this could help cut down on any that was flying through the air along with any dust. It does a fantastic job filtering dust but there wasn’t a lot of pet hair collected (it may just be too long to suction). I’ve attached some photos of the filter after a few days of use, and one with it lit up in the dark. It’s very quiet when on the lower fan settings, but if you intend to use it at max you’ll hear it - though to me it sounds like white noise and isn’t much of a bother. The design is sleek and modern, would have loved it in black, but I’m quite happy with it thus far. The filter is underneath the bottom compartment and is easy to access for filter changes. I haven’t needed to change it as of yet, but it says the purifier will glow red when it’s due for changing which is nifty. I also really appreciated that they included a specific search key phrase for when the filter needs a replacement! Pasting it here in case someone needs it. Search for B0CH7VVB1J to find Airspark replacement filter for AS200 / AS300
